channel.title: Java 3D / Pixel?
channel.description:
Okay, well im new to this part of the website first off.
So basically ive been working with java and other languages for a while, been making a few games and so on, 2d and a few pixelated like hell 3d.
Well now im currently working on a rpg in java, figured it would be a good sideproject while im in college. Issue im currently at is getting the pixels of a rotated model without using a gameengine like jme3 or any of the others.
So any idea on how i would go about getting the pixels of the rotated model?
